"Oh, leave off!" said the accountant with a beaming but rather cunning smile, as if flat- tered at being made the subject of Zherk6v's joke, and purposely trying to appear stupider than he really was. 
"It is very strange, mon Monsieur Prince" said the staff officer. (He remembered that in French there is some peculiar way of address- ing a prince, but could not get it quite right.)
